```scss
// Property: importance
// Description: The audio stream type to use when playing the sound.
// Component(s): Ti.Android.NotificationChannel
'.importance': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_DEFAULT }
'.importance-high': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_HIGH }
'.importance-low': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_LOW }
'.importance-max': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_MAX }
'.importance-min': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_MIN }
'.importance-none': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_NONE }
'.importance-unspecified': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_UNSPECIFIED }
```
